song_lyrics: Joyu sarave jagat tapāsī re raḍh lāgī,
Ek puruṣh dīṭhā avināshī re raḍh lāgī. 1
Bījī abaḷānī sarve ṭoḷī re raḍh
Dīṭhu chaud bhuvan lagī khoḷī re raḍh꠶ 2
Abaḷā abaḷāne shu paraṇu re raḍh
Māṭe baḷiyānu līdhu sharaṇu re raḍh꠶ 3
Kān kuvarthī sagapaṇ kīdhu re raḍh
Enu me’ṇu me māthe līdhu re raḍh꠶ 4
Shīsh nākhyo have me to chheḍo re raḍh
Lāgyo nandnā nandan sāthe neḍo re raḍh꠶ 5
Sarve avar puruṣh parahariyā r, raḍh
title: Joyu sarave jagat tapāsī re raḍh lāgī

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1069: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
